email.title: Weekly Digest

image.alt: Pie Chart of Last Week's Biscuit Vote
image.title: Thanks for voting, people who care about the biscuit <3!

email.text:
Hello everyone,
Welcome to another week of the DoCSoc digest! It's even more-on-time this week!
This week, we bring you a Microsoft Cognitive Services workshop!
**Also, you can sign up for our very own Valentine's Service, only until Thursday 8th February. If here is someone special who you would like to send a rose and message to, [sign up here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdeGAXfxl-DBHFd1xDdP3vMIRcP7oEWZWgJWSYt51-MdayGgw/viewform).
Last week, over 70 of you voted and decided the future of the biscuit. From now on, the bottom of the digest will include a link to a form where biscuits for the next week may be suggested. The biscuit that we send out remains at the discretion of the DoCSoc committee, but your suggestions should really help. Plus, we'll credit you for the suggestion next to the biscuit form link!
email.heading: Microsoft Cognitive Services: Hands On Workshop

event.text:
Come along to learn about Microsoft Cognitive Services, including the Custom Vision AI Service. After learning about these services, there will be a hands on workshop so you can see for yourself how easy it is to build and deploy your projects using these services!
All experience levels welcome and please make sure you bring your laptop with you. Food and drink will be provided at the event and there will also be giveaways!

email.heading: The Valentine's Bar Night

event.text:
It's time for the first Bar Night of 2018! Once again, we'll be meeting in Metric at 7pm for an evening of free drinks and great conversation.
Drinks tokens will be given upon entry for FREE to any member of DoCSoc. Tokens are valid for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks.

email.heading: Internships 101
UROP 101
JetBrains: Kotlin Hands-On
DoCSoc hosts Google Hash Code
IC HealthHack 2018
email.sign:
That's all for now!
Until next time,
email.text: This week's biscuit brought to you by: Biscuit Voters! [Submit Biscuit](https://docsoc.co.uk/suggest-biscuit).
